details: Instantiated file access layer task from template and outlined module deliverables
Implemented FileAccess module, shared types, and sample log output
Authored docs/file_access_layer.md and node:test suite for file access operations
Ran node scripts/validate_schemas.mjs after adding docs and TS modules
Added TypeScript build scripts and generator leveraging FileAccess
npm test requires dev dependencies (tsx/typescript) which are not installed in this environment
npm test failed: validator call count mismatch and platform-specific path assertions
Resolved FileAccess test failures (validation dedupe, path normalization, sync logging) and npm test now passes
npm test and schema validations passed; checklist validated
File access layer, tooling, docs, and tests delivered
